subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text:
* In Taiwan, the upper right component is written {{l|mul|sc=Jpan<!-- Note: Not sc=Hant for 𠫓 -->|𠫓}} ({{l|mul|⿱[[亠]][[厶]]}}) which is the original form found in the historical ''{{w|Zihui}}'' {{w2|zh|pref=《|字彙 (梅膺祚)|字彙|suf=》}} dictionary.
* In mainland China, the upper right component is written {{l|mul|sc=Hans|亡}} which is the form found in the historical {{w|Kangxi Dictionary}} (similar to {{l|mul|慌}} but without the grass radical {{l|mul|艹}}).
